name: Bastet's Temple
description:
Stark and his ball stumble upon a ruin hidden in the forest, which turns out to be the ancient temple of the egyptian goddess bastet. To gain entry, they must solve a puzzle

R - RESET

WASD - Move

E - Interacting with objects and picking up ball

F - Push/throw ball

Mouse for look direction

Nikolaj - Coding

Nayada - Artist

Made for Nordic Game Jam 2023

Themes: Nostalgia, Mythical Creatures, The Feels
